feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student demonstrates a functioning financial application with concrete calculations (loan amount, monthly payment, total paid, interest) and multiple example scenarios, plus iterative development per DRIVER stages. Despite some performance issues noted in reflection, the app performs the required financial tasks, meeting the PASS criteria.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows a functioning AI-enabled chat that accepts natural inputs and computes loan amounts, monthly payments, and total interest with example scenarios—demonstrating clear value beyond superficial use (Discover + Implement). The student also reflects on limitations and performance, indicating iterative development and awareness of constraints (Reflect), which supports a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "it would give you the amount of loan that we took out, a monthly payment, how much we'll end up paying over time, um, with interest and other fees."
"Loop one, it's all about financing a car, buying a car, however you want to do it."
"it calculated my monthly payment 72 months and calculated the loan and the interest that would be added on top of the loan and it still fits within the $400 600 monthly payment range."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: defined the problem as financing a car ("Loop one... financing a car").  
Implement: built an auto-calculation workflow that computes loan amount, monthly payment, total interest ("it would calculate this automatically once I typed it in").  
Reflect: acknowledged performance/issues and iterative improvements ("This also took me a while to figure out... still something going on with this").
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates a functioning financial application with concrete calculations (loan amount, monthly payment, total paid, interest) and multiple example scenarios, plus iterative development per DRIVER stages. Despite some performance issues noted in reflection, the app performs the required financial tasks, meeting the PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I added a chat version in this... But once you execute that workflow, it would give you an answer, give you the amount of loan that we took out, a monthly payment, how much we'll end up paying over time, um, with interest and other fees."
"it would calculate this automatically once I typed it in."
"I said I was looking for between 400 to 600. It became 450 to 470."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: identified user need and two design loops ("Loop one... Loop two, I made it easier to use"); Implement: built automated calculation and chat interface that computes loan, payments, interest; Reflect: noted debugging/performance issues and limitations when testing.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows a functioning AI-enabled chat that accepts natural inputs and computes loan amounts, monthly payments, and total interest with example scenarios—demonstrating clear value beyond superficial use (Discover + Implement). The student also reflects on limitations and performance, indicating iterative development and awareness of constraints (Reflect), which supports a PASS.
